Many times, the true leaders are the ones you never knew were leading at all. They are the few who listen and take other viewpoints into account. They are the ones who buck-up instead of giving up when faced with a difficult task. They are respectfulâ€¦even when it is hard. They are the ones looking for the silver lining in every bad situation. And they are the ones who hold themselves accountable. These people lead easily, and often, without notice, because their leadership is not instruction but inspiration! We call leaders like this: Hidden Leaders!

For this reason the 8th grade teachers wanted to take time to acknowledge some Hidden Leaders here at Cardinal! Congrats guys, keep it up!

post_text: Thursday night our yearly Staff vs Student basketball game was played with female staff members playing against the Lady Cardinals and male staff members playing against the Cardinals. While all teams played a tough game, the Lady Cardinals won against the female staff members and the male staff members won against the Cardinals. Cardinals R.E.D. cheerleaders and Staff cheerleaders performed during halftime. Between games, younger children played a game of basketball. Everyone had a lot of fun and we can't wait until next year!
